meanings.definition: To bring under government control or regulation.
meanings.sent1: The new law governmentalized the previously unregulated industry.
meanings.sent2: The city governmentalized the public transportation system for better efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The rebellious robots were governmentalized by the strict new robot laws.
meanings.sent4: The wild horses were governmentalized by the ranchers to prevent chaos.
meanings.sent5: The magical spell governmentalized the unruly spirits into obedient servants.

meanings.sent1: The governmentalized agency followed strict government rules.
meanings.sent2: The governmentalized citizens had to abide by the new regulations.
meanings.sent3: The governmentalized playground was monitored by the park rangers.
meanings.sent4: The governmentalized territory was under strict government control.
meanings.sent5: The governmentalized students learned about civic duties in school.
